reviewText: My wife, who is learning Tahitian dance said this video was not that instructive compared to others she uses.
Great step by step guide.  Thanks!
well done lots of information thank you

It used to be (ten years ago) that very little other than this (on VHS tape) was readily available. That has changed a bit but this is still a stellar teaching tool.  Mahea Uchiyama is the bee's knees.
At home video style of recording- very excited for the level 2 workshop which was bare minimum- the beginners portion was decent and explained several terms I had difficulties with
